reviews.comment: Gusi aku jadi gak ngilu lagi setelah pakai obat kumur ini.

title: Tongue Cleaner
description: An effective tongue cleaner removes bacteria and food debris from the surface of the tongue.
howToUse: Use Tongue Cleaner to gently clean the surface of your tongue every day to maintain oral hygiene.

reviews.name: Qori
reviews.comment: Lidahku jadi bersih dan nafas terasa lebih segar setelah pakai pembersih lidah ini.

title: Interdental Brush Set
description: Interdental brushes in one set that clean between teeth effectively.
howToUse: Use Interdental Brush Set to gently clean between teeth every day to maintain oral hygiene.

reviews.name: Refi
reviews.comment: Sikat interdentalnya efektif membersihkan sela gigi yang susah dijangkau.

title: Dry Mouth Relief Spray
description: Dry mouth relief spray that moisturizes and freshens the mouth.
howToUse: Spray Dry Mouth Relief Spray directly onto your mouth and gums, then let it absorb for a soft, fresh finish.

reviews.name: Rini
reviews.comment: Mulutku terasa lebih lembap dan segar setelah pakai spray ini.

title: Mouth Guard Night Care
description: A mouth guard for night care that protects teeth from damage caused by grinding.
howToUse: Place a Mouth Guard Night Care on your teeth before bed to protect them from damage caused by grinding.

reviews.name: Sandi
reviews.comment: Giginya terlindungi dengan baik saat tidur setelah pakai mouth guard ini.

title: Plaque Reveal Chew Tablets
description: Chewable tablets that help break down plaque on teeth for more effective cleaning.
howToUse: Use Plaque Reveal Chew Tablets daily after brushing to help reveal plaque on teeth.

reviews.name: Tina
reviews.comment: Tablet kunyahnya membantu aku melihat plak yang harus dibersihkan.

title: Kids Strawberry Toothpaste
description: Strawberry flavored toothpaste especially for children that cleans teeth gently and pleasantly.
howToUse: Use Kids Strawberry Toothpaste to gently brush children's teeth every day to maintain oral hygiene.

reviews.name: Umar
reviews.comment: Anakku suka banget sama rasa stroberinya dan giginya jadi bersih.
